key: Open Depth Effect in Bottom Right (Some Wallpapers)
en: Open Depth Effect in Bottom Right (Some Wallpapers)
zh: 右下⾓打开景深效果(部分壁纸)
点击右上⾓ “完成” 按钮

key:
Now, you can install the following 'Shortcuts' to enable automatic wallpaper change.
For detailed installation methods, please refer to 'Setup Tutorial'
en:
Now, you can install the following 'Shortcuts' to enable automatic wallpaper changer.
For detailed installation methods, please refer to 'Setup Tutorial'
zh:
现在，你可以安装以下「快捷指令」，实现自动更换壁纸功能。
详细安装方法请参考「设置教程」

key: Get the latest issue of Collection, randomly select a wallpaper, and automatically set it as lock screen and desktop wallpaper.
en: Get the latest issue of Collection, select a random wallpaper and automatically set it as Lock Screen and Home Screen wallpaper.
zh: 获取最新一期的 Collection 随机一张壁纸，并自动设置成锁屏和桌面壁纸。

key: 🥳 You have unlocked all HD wallpaper originals
en: 🥳 Congrats! You have unlocked all HD wallpaper in original
zh: 🥳您已解锁全部高清壁纸原片

key: Purchase Failed, Please Try Again Later
en: Purchase Failed, Please Try Again Later

key: Swipe up for options menu, click 'Set as Wallpaper'
en: Swipe up for options menu, click 'Set as Wallpaper'
zh: 上划操作菜单，点击 “⽤作墙纸”

en: Unable to Connect to the Server

key: Login Failed, Please Try Again Later
en: Sign In Failed, Please Try Again Later
zh: 登录失败,请稍后重新尝试

key: Video Imported Successfully, Please Click to Generate
en: Video Imported Successfully, Please Click Generate
zh: 视频导入成功, 请点击生成

en: Search Wallpaper By Name or Code

key: Subscription Status Error? Please Restore Purchase
zh: 订阅状态出错？恢复购买

en: Maybe Later, Take a Look First

key: Randomly select one from 'My Favorites' and automatically set it as the current wallpaper. This feature is only available to subscribed users.
en: Randomly select one from 'My Favorites' and automatically set it as wallpaper. This feature is only available to subscribed users.
zh: 从「我的收藏」里随机选择一张，并自动设置为当前壁纸。此功能仅开放给订阅用户使用。

key: Add the wallpaper change action to desktop widget for use anytime
en: Add the wallpaper change action to desktop widget for convenient use anytime.
zh: 将更换壁纸的动作添加到桌面小组件随时使用

key: Save Failed, Image Does Not Exist!
en: Failed to Save, Image Does Not Exist!

key: Set suitable shortcuts for lock screen or main screen wallpaper
en: Set suitable shortcuts for Lock Screen or Home Screen wallpaper
zh: 为锁屏或主屏壁纸单独设置适合的快捷指令

key: Thank you for using boring day! Before logging out, please read the following important tips carefully and fully understand the impact of logging out. Please proceed with the account deletion process after cancelling the automatic subscription. Once the boring day account is logged out, it cannot be recovered. The avatar, username, favorites, member-related information redeemed with the redemption code bound to the account will be permanently deleted. The wallpapers saved in the local album will not be affected. Members purchased with Apple ID will not be affected, but you need to restore the purchase and register a new account to continue using! Please operate with caution!
en: Thank you for using Boring Day! Before deleting your account, please read the following important tips very carefully and fully understand the impact of Delete Account. Please cancel the automatic subscription before processing Delete Account. Once Boring Day account is deleted, it cannot be recovered. The Avatar, Username, Favorites, Membership redeemed with redemption code will be permanently deleted. Wallpapers saved in the Photos will not be affected. Membership purchased with Apple ID will not be affected, but you need to restore the purchase and register a new account to continue using! Please operate carefully!
zh: 感谢您使用boring day! 在删除账号前，请您仔细阅读以下重要提示并充分理解删除账号所带来的影响，请在取消自动订阅后再继续删除帐户的流程。boring day 账号一旦删除将不可恢复找回。账号绑定的头像、用户名、收藏、兑换码兑换过的会员等相关信息将被永久删除。你保存在本地相册的壁纸不会受到影响。使用Apple ID 购买的会员不会受到影响，但是需要你重新进行恢复购买再注册新的账号才能继续使用! 请谨慎操作!

key: Please select the shortcuts you want to install
en: Please select the shortcuts you want to install
zh: 请选择您想安装的快捷指令

key: Don't forget to automatically create a good 'boring day' album, you can always quickly find our app downloaded wallpaper products in this album
en: Don't forget the automatically created 'boring day' album, you can always find downloaded wallpapers from our app in this album quickly
zh: 别忘了⾃动创建好的「boring day」相簿，您总是能在这个相簿中快速找到我们App下载的壁纸产品

key: Automatically set the latest downloaded picture in the iOS album as the current wallpaper.
en: Automatically set the latest downloaded picture in the iOS album as wallpaper.
zh: 将 iOS 相册中最新下载的图片，自动设置成当前壁纸。

key: Through automation settings, your iPhone wallpaper can be automatically switched, even when running in the background. For example, your wallpaper in the Favorites will automatically loop at 7 am every day.
en: Through automation settings, your iPhone wallpaper can be automatically switched even when running in background. For example, your wallpapers in Favorites will automatically loop at 7 am in the morning every day.
zh: 通过自动化设置，你的iPhone 壁纸可以自动切换，即使在后台运行时。比如，每天早 7 点将自动轮播你收藏夹内的壁纸。

key: Wallpaper Save Failed, Please Open Permissions
en: Wallpaper Failed to Save, Please Turn on Permissions
zh: 壁纸保存失败,请打开权限

key: Randomly set a Boring Day App's free picture and automatically set it as the current wallpaper. Subscribed users will be able to randomly access all wallpapers.
en: Randomly set a Boring Day App's free picture and automatically set it as wallpaper. Subscribed users will be able to access to all wallpapers.
zh: 随机设置一张 Boring Day App 内的免费图片并自动设置成当前壁纸，订阅用户将可以随机到全部壁纸。

en: Become a Pro Member and Unlock All Features

key: Find and open the just downloaded wallpaper in the mobile photo, click the share button in the lower left corner
en: Find and open latest downloaded wallpapers in Photos, click Share button in the lower left corner
zh: 在⼿机照片中找到并打开刚下载的壁纸，点击左下⾓分享按钮

key: Set as Wallpaper Combination, or customize the desktop image from photos
en: Set as wallpaper combination, or customize the Home Screen by selecting images match to the wallpaper.
zh: 设为墙纸组合，或⾃定义主屏幕从照片中选择与之配套的桌⾯图片

en: Download HD Wallpapers For Free @Boring Day
zh: 高清壁纸免费下载 @Boring Day

key: Unable to Store Images, Please Authorize First!
en: Unable to Save Images, Please Authorize the App First!
zh: 无法存储图片，请先授权！

key:
After confirming the subscription, the fee will be charged to your App Store account according to the above price
Renewal: Apple account will be deducted 24 hours before the expiration, and it will be automatically renewed through your iTunes account. If you want to upgrade to a one-time permanent purchase, please cancel the automatic renewal and make the purchase.
Cancel renewal: To cancel the renewal, please manage your subscription in the App Store 24 hours before the current subscription expires.
en:
After confirmed the subscription, the fee will be charged to your App Store account according to the above price
Renewal: Payment will be deducted 24 hours before the expiration, and it will be automatically renewed through your iTunes account. If you want to upgrade to a permanent purchase, please cancel the automatic renewal first and make the purchase.
Cancel renewal: To cancel the renewal, please manage your subscription in the App Store 24 hours before the current subscription expires.
zh:
确认订阅后将按上述价格向您的 App Store 账户收取费用
续订: 苹果账户会在到期前 24小时内扣费，并通过您的iTunes账户自动续订。如需升级为一次性永久购买，请取消自动续订后进行购买。
取消续订: 如需取消续订，请在当前订阅到期 24小时以前，在 App Store 进行订阅管理。
